category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
O GOD, YOUR LOVE IS ON ANOTHER LEVEL,

You are good when You give,
and You are good when You take away.
You are good when the sun is shining on me,
and You are good when the night closes in.

You loved me before the world even began,
and out of that love, You saved me.
You still love me now,
in spite of my stubborn heart, my lack of gratitude, and my distrust.

Your goodness was with me all last year,
leading me through confusing and twisted paths.
When it felt like I was retreating, You helped me move forward;
when I was beaten back, You made sure I was still making progress.

I know Your goodness will be with me in the year ahead.
I'm pulling up the anchor and setting my sails,
with You as the guide for my future, just as You have been for my past.

I'm actually thankful that You've hidden what's coming next.
If You have planned for me to go through storms and struggles,
I know You will be with me in them.
If I have to face intense pressure or temptation,
I know I won't drown.
If this is the year I'm meant to die,
it just means I'll get to see Your face sooner.
If a painful ending is part of my story,
give me the strength to make sure my faith doesn't fall apart.
If I'm sidelined from the work I love doing for You,
I can't make any demands.

Just let my life bring You glory, in the good times and the hard times,
so I can always be ready and useful for Your purpose.
